Sentencas: Glass and glass-ceramic materials were investigated as SOFC seals at 800similar to850 degreesC.
Titulo: Application of glass sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The material was based on the glass and glass-ceramic in the BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2-La2O3-B2O3 system.
Titulo: Application of glass sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The sealant has a minimum thermal expansion mismatch with yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte and Ni/8YSZ for the anode.
Titulo: Application of glass sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The sealant has a superior stability during the process of operation in SOFC and can withstand thermal shock during the process of thermal cycling.
Titulo: Application of glass sealant for SOFC

Sentencas: The results show that the BaO-CaO-Al2O3-SiO2-La2O3-B2O3 system sealant can be used as sealing materials for SOFC.
Titulo: Application of glass sealant for SOFC
